PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2023-12132023-12-08JUS
ActContraventions Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Contraventions Regulations (Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999)
PrecisRegulations Amending the CONTRAVENTIONS REGULATIONS (CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999) in order to (1) increase fine amounts identified for each contravention designated under Schedule I.3 of the regulations for offences provided under the CEPA, 1999 and speficied 31 regulations; and (2) repeal as contraventions from Schedule I.3 to the regulations 21 offences contained in the specified 14 regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0266 Publication Date: 2023-12-20
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the CONTRAVENTIONS REGULATIONS (CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999) in order to (1) increase fine amounts identified for each contravention designated under Schedule I.3 of the regulations for offences provided under the CEPA, 1999 and speficied 31 regulations; and (2) repeal as contraventions from Schedule I.3 to the regulations 21 offences contained in the specified 14 regulations.
